Lyrics: Contre raison vous m'êtes fort étrange.
Direct Translation: Against reason, you seem very strange to me.
Poetic Translation: Lacking reason, you’re baffling and unnerving.

Lyrics: Est-ce bien fait? En aurez-vous louange?
Direct Translation: Have I done well? Will you praise me?
Poetic Translation: Have I done well? Please praise if I’m deserving!

Direct Translation: To have thus suddenly disinherited me
Poetic Translation: Thus suddenly from love me to dismiss,

Lyrics: de votre amour, sans l'avoir mérité.
Direct Translation: from your love, without having deserved it --
Poetic Translation: Although I merit no treatment like this --

Lyrics: Vous fait-il mal si à vous servir je me range?
Direct Translation: Does it hurt you if I am set on serving you?
Poetic Translation: What do you lose if I am set on serving?
